# siwper

<template>
  <div class="activites">
    <div class="activites__container">
      <ul :style="{width: bannerLists.length*420 +'px'}"
          class="activites__container--list">
        <li v-for="(slide, index) in bannerLists"
            :key="index"
            :style="{ left: -index*420 + 'px',zIndex:index === showKey?1:0 }"
            :class="{'activites__container--active': index === showKey}"
            class="activites__container--li">
          <a :href="slide.url"
             target="_blank"
             @click.prevent="headadReport(slide, index)">
            <img :src="slide.img"
                 width="420"
                 height="270">
          </a>
        </li>
      </ul>
      <div :style="{width: bannerLists.length*22 +'px'}"
           class="activites__container__pagination">
        <i v-for="(slide, index) in bannerLists"
           :key="index"
           :class="{'activites__container__pagination--btn':true,
             'activites__container__pagination--active':index === showKey}"
           @mouseover="switchTab(index)"
           @mouseout="continueSwitch" />
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  components: {
  },
  props: {
    bannerLists: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    }
  },
  data () {
    return {
      showKey: 0,
      timer: 0
    }
  },
  computed: {
  },
  mounted () {
    this.continueSwitch()
  },
  methods: {
    continueSwitch () {
      this.timer = setInterval(() => {
        this.showKey++
        this.showKey = this.showKey > this.bannerLists.length - 1 ? 0 : this.showKey
      }, 4000)
    },
    switchTab (index) {
      this.showKey = index
      clearInterval(this.timer)
    },
    swipeItemClick (index) {
      const nums = ['010', '011', '019']
      if (nums[index]) {
        dyweTrackEvent('home', 'ad' + nums[index])  // eslint-disable-line
      }
    },
    swipeBottomClick (index, type, href) {
      const nums = ['012', '013', '014']
      if (nums[index]) {
        dyweTrackEvent('home', 'ad' + nums[index])  //eslint-disable-line
      }
      window.open(href, '_myzl')
    },
    headadReport (slide, index) {
      const href = slide.url
      window.open(href, { target: '_blank' })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
/* eslint-disable */

.activites {
  &__container {
    cursor: pointer;
    height: 270px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
    width: 420px;

    &--list {
      height: 270px;
    }

    &--li {
      float: left;
      opacity: 0;
      position: relative;
      -webkit-transition: opacity 500ms ease-in-out;
           -o-transition: opacity ease-in-out 500ms;
         -moz-transition: opacity ease-in-out 500ms;
              transition: opacity 500ms ease-in-out;
    }

    &--active {
      opacity: 1;
    }

    &__pagination {
      bottom: 20px;
      height: 18px;
      left: 0;
      margin: auto;
      position: absolute;
      right: 0;
      z-index: 1;

      &--btn {
        background-color: rgba(100, 100, 100, 0);
        border-radius: 50%;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        display: inline-block;
        height: 20px;
        // margin-right: 10px;
        position: relative;
        text-align: center;
        transition: background 0.2s ease;
        vertical-align: bottom;
        width: 20px;
      }

      &--btn::after {
        border: 2px solid #c8c8c8;
        border-radius: 50%;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        content: '';
        display: block;
        height: 12px;
        left: 4px;
        position: absolute;
        top: 4px;
        -webkit-transition: all 0.2s ease;
             -o-transition: all ease 0.2s;
             -o-transition: all 0.2s ease;
                transition: all 0.2s ease;
        width: 12px;
      }

      &--active {
        background: hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 0.2);
      }

      &--active::after {
        background: #fff;
        border-color: hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 0.4);
      }
    }
  }
}
</style>

在vue中使用

import Banners from './Banners'

export default { components: { Banners } }

<banners :banner-lists= [] />
